nodes.text: Regulgo was a planet located in the Regulgo system, a part of the Ryndellian sector within the Mid Rim and Trailing Sectors regions. Months after Han Solo departed Kamar in approximately 2 BBY, Kamarians tracked him down on Regulgo. While there, the Kamarians attacked Solo and took him captive; however, Solo eventually escaped.

Regulgo was first mentioned in the 2005 novel Dark Nest II: The Unseen Queen, written by Troy Denning. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Regulgo system, and therefore the planet Regulgo, within grid square P-17.
